events.message: I received my order but I want to return it because the product is not what I expected and I would like a full refund.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning return and refund.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah Jones for handling the refund process.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help with your refund request and will guide you through the process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return in more detail so I can assist you better?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product does not match the description on the website, so I would like to return it.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process and you will receive instructions shortly on how to send the product back.
Thank you for your quick response and for starting the refund process. I appreciate the support and will follow the instructions.
The refund session is now active and the return label has been sent to your email. Please use it to ship the product back at your earliest convenience.
Just checking in to see if you have sent the product back and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I have shipped the product yesterday and I’m waiting for the refund to be processed. Thank you for the follow-up.
Your refund has been successfully processed and the amount has been credited back to your original payment method.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. Please share your feedback when you have a moment.
Customer completed the survey indicating satisfaction with the refund process and customer support received.
The case has been formally closed following the successful refund and positive customer feedback.
